value.title: How to debug a DAX measure
value.excerpt: Use DAX Studio to run and debug a DAX measure: fix a calculation issue in a more productive environment and then copy the right formula back in Power BI. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/ VertiPaq Analyzer: https://www.sqlbi.com/tools/vertipaq-analyzer/

value.title: Understanding the difference between LASTDATE and MAX in DAX

value.title: Consume data with Power BI
value.excerpt: Do you want to make business decisions backed by data? Learn how to do that in Power BI. Learn to work in Power BI to review and interact with this content to make business decisions.

topItems.title: Explore what Power BI can do for you
topItems.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll work in the Power BI service to review and interact with content that has been shared with you. This module provides the foundational information that you need to work effectively in the Power BI service.

topItems.title: Analyze data with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This module goes beyond viewing and exploring your content and explains how to interact with it by working with reports and dashboards to uncover and share new business insights.

topItems.title: Get to your data on the go with the Power BI Mobile apps
topItems.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll use the Power BI mobile app to review and interact with the content that is available to you in the Power BI service while you're on the go. This module provides the information that you need to work effectively with the Power BI mobile apps.

value.title: Analyze data with Power BI
value.excerpt: This module goes beyond viewing and exploring your content and explains how to interact with it by working with reports and dashboards to uncover and share new business insights.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Add calculated tables and columns to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to add calculated tables and calculated columns to your data model. You'll also be able to describe row context, which is used to evaluated calculated column formulas. Because it's possible to add columns to a table using Power Query, you'll also learn when it's best to create calculated columns instead of Power Query computed columns.

value.title: Describe Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn about the Power BI Desktop model structure, star schema design basics, analytics queries, and report visual configuration. This module provides a strong foundation on which you can learn to optimize model designs and add model calculations.

value.title: Use DAX time intelligence functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, youâ€™ll learn the meaning of time intelligence and how to add time intelligence DAX calculations to your model. These calculations will include year-to-date (YTD), year-over-year (YoY) growth, and others.

value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
value.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Get to your data on the go with the Power BI Mobile apps
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll use the Power BI mobile app to review and interact with the content that is available to you in the Power BI service while you're on the go. This module provides the information that you need to work effectively with the Power BI mobile apps.

value.title: Explore what Power BI can do for you
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll work in the Power BI service to review and interact with content that has been shared with you. This module provides the foundational information that you need to work effectively in the Power BI service.

value.title: Introduction to foundations in data modeling
value.excerpt: This module introduces the key concepts that are related to developing a well-organized data model.

value.title: Connect data to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides the foundational information needed to connect to your data confidently with the new platform.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Calculate Totals for  MTD, QTD and YTD in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly use the CALCULATE function to get total from year to date, month to date and quarter to date in Power BI using a Calendar table and time intelligence functions in DAX.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code. value.title: How to Get Round Corners on Visuals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Follow these easy-to-follow instructions to learn how to round the corners of your visuals borders in Power BI.

value.title: Machine Learning Anomaly Detection with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Use the Isolation Forest algorithm to create unsupervised machine learning to identify outliers in your data. Leverage the power of Sckit Learn and Power BI

value.title: Price Prediction with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a machine learning price prediction using Python machine learning linear regression model and a dataset of 54,000 diamonds. This will be ported over to Power BI for a deeper level of interaction.  You can find the files and dataset here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Diamond-Price-Prediction

value.title: Statistics and Correlation Tables in Power BI with Python
value.excerpt: Learn how to build summary statistics tables that have min, max, quartiles, standard deviation and mode and counts in one tables. value.title: Year over Year and Month over Month Calculations in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly produce time intelligence calcution in Power BI using these easy to follow DAX equations. Elevate your time series analysis.
